description: a single question in a Quiz

questionIndex.description: an index unique in the Quiz, used to refer to this question

prompt.description: the user-readable prompt for this question

reference.description: This field is deprecated. Please use helpText and docLink.

docLink.description: Link to the document that contains information for background reading related to the question.

helpText.description: A short text that provides a snippet of help to answer the question.
